security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document contains payroll authorization forms for James K. Conzelman, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), including his social security number, salary, and position title, with Louis Stokes and Henry B. Gonzalez as authorizing officials.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents consists of payroll authorization forms and a related memo concerning James K. Conzelman's employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) from 1976 to 1979. These forms, authorized by Louis Stokes and Henry B. Gonzalez, detail Conzelman's appointment, salary adjustments, position titles (including 'Researcher'), and eventual termination, along with his social security number. The collection also includes a memo from the Budget Officer regarding payroll certification requirements, specifically concerning familial relationships between staff employees and Members of Congress.
title: Final Determination Notification & Staff Payroll Records
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
